name: UpdatedFortniteDropper&Challenges
0:
”Alexa, ask Fortnite Dropper where we dropping boys.”
”Alexa, ask Fortnite Dropper for a challenge.”
”Alexa, ask Fortnite Dropper for coordinates.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fortnite dropper
des:
PARADISE Chapter 3 Season 4! Ask Fortnite Dropper for new locations and new/updated challenges :)

When you or the squad can't decide where to land, Fortnite Dropper knows the way!

This unofficial skill allows you to ask Fortnite Dropper where to land through Alexa A.I.

You can also ask Fortnite Dropper for a challenge, more challenges soon!

Plus the ability to ask Fortnite Dropper for coordinates, great for unnamed locations.

The more the skill is used the more content is added, so please dive in with Fortnite Dropper as much as you can :)

This is my first skill, leave feedback with a review or comment, thank you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
